snippet.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Boo or Boom [03] Flash Game Longplay
snippet.description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Boo or Boom is a 2007 action game based on the SpongeBob SquarePants episode "Scaredy Pants". On Halloween, no one ever comes to Plankton's Chum Bucket Halloween Bash. If he can't have his party, then no one can. He blocked all the streets of Bikini Bottom with his Plank-O-Lanterns. It's up to SpongeBob, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward to bring the magic of Halloween back to Bikini Bottom by clearing its streets of Plankton's obstacles. In The game each tile is worth 50 points and every house surronded by your color is worth 100 points. You are competing against the other three characters, bomberman style to cover the most ground. If you win you get teh good ending of everyone gettting candy and Plankton having a change of heart. If you lose, you get the bad ending where Plankton's plan worked.

Halloween Themed Games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBA7nqyBa-vxg0Uj3lwYchv923lZKGQYQ
Flash Games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBA7nqyBa-vy9mA70UvCoKVC7cbRuPz1l
SpongeBob Games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBA7nqyBa-vyWgcOy90usiBRQqnOypgW2
Nickelodeon Games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBA7nqyBa-vxOow29zh4FOkdcolLGaMOq

Time Codes:
0:09 - Story
0:23 - How To Play
0:41 - Level 1
2:30 - Level 2
4:18 - Level 3
6:06 - Good Ending

#spongebob #halloween #mutchgames #longplay
